item.title: Neo4j vs Dgraph - The numbers speak for themselves
item.description:
As Dgraph is nearing its v0.8 release, we wanted to spend some time comparing it against Neo4j, which is the most popular graph database.

We have divided this post into five parts:

  1. Loading data
  2. Querying
  3. Issues faced
  4. Dgraph vs Neo4j Feature Comparison
  5. Principles behind Dgraph

item.title: Dgraph hugo blog theme
item.description: We at Dgraph love Hugo and use it for our blog. It’s blazingly fast, supports Markdown is written in Go and is very easy to work with.

item.title: Dgraph: JSON vs. Binary clients
item.description: When I started building the initial version of the Dgraph Go client, we were looking for a serialization format which was fast, easy to use and supported multiple language runtimes. We finally implemented our client using Protocol Buffers which gave twice the speed and consumed two-third memory compared to JSON according to our benchmarks.
